data.system_settings: LG Fortune, Android 6.0.1 (main), Samsung Galaxy Tab A, Android 7.1.1 (alt)
data.actual_result: Infinite searching. Nearby Scanning does not catch the user (However, you can send the friend request by manually typing the discord user, so I can confirm that it should catch).
data.expected_result: It should catch your friend's account or your alt.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a real life friend (or a second device if you are lonely like me :D) ready with different accounts (I used my alt to test). - On both devices, head to "Add Friend" and click on the "Start Nearby Scanning". - Observe.
